snippet: Video posted on YouTube five days ago, apparently showing a missing American journalist in the hands of jihadist captors in Syria, may have been staged.
abstract: Video posted on YouTube five days ago, apparently showing a missing American journalist in the hands of jihadist captors in Syria, may have been staged.

headline.main: Analysts Say Video of American Held in Syria May Have Been Staged
